Name: The Nimbus Chorale: Glory to Humanity
AttributesDescription: A musical record found in Nimbus Sanctum. This chorale was performed by the people of Rinascita long before the Order's founding.
BgDescription: "We thank each ancestor who boarded the ship of expedition, knowing they will never return. Time would wear their bodies down, yet their unwavering will carried them forward."
ObtainedShowDescription: A musical record found in Nimbus Sanctum. This chorale was performed by the people of Rinascita long before the Order's founding.
